subject: Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Grimmette and Brian Martin, the United States’ most decorated doubles luge sliders, announced their retirement after placing second at USA Luge’s national championships in Lake Placid, N.Y.
snippet: Mark Grimmette and Brian Martin, the United States’ most decorated doubles luge sliders, announced their retirement after placing second at USA Luge’s national championships in Lake Placid, N.Y.
